channel.title: Server crashing after 10 or 11 players
channel.description:
Ok so i am running a good server based off cammypvp source (i'm like the only one who decided to actually change a bunch of things with this source so its not leeched or anything) but the problem comes whenever i get too many players
whenever i have 10 or 11 players online, the server dc's everyone for a second i dont think there is a problem with my vps as it was doing that same thing on my computer before i ever used a vps and my computer has 3gb RAM my vps has 1gb RAM and it dc's everyone at 10+ players online, and on my vps i even set the server's priority to realtime but it doesnt affect the problem at all, and only 30% of the ram is needed to even run the server so its definitely not an issue with bad computers or w/e. and the vps has amazing connection speed.
im guessing this is a problem with stability of the source or something but i really dont want to scrap my server and start off with a new source because it took me ages to do all the coding/programming/whatever u call it, with this source
if anyone has an idea on how to make my server more stable/let it hold more then 10 players at a time, it would be so deeply appreciated and even though i cant give you rep, i think it would still be great to offer help

item.title: Server crashing after 10 or 11 players
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

As stated above, the best solution is to use a more stable source.

Read full topic

item.title: Server crashing after 10 or 11 players
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Infinity Zr:

Just use the playerrights 2 and just change the commands… to your name (if you dont want other people using)

tbh make a new void that is called in on login and if your name is YOURNAME then it will add you the admin crown but not give you playerRights > 0; then you can change all commands so they work when YOURNAME does them.

Read full topic

item.title: Server crashing after 10 or 11 players
item.dc:creator: @Confusedcrap Confusedcrap
item.description:
@Confusedcrap wrote:

doesnt help since that’s just hidden owner on my server

anymore ideas on how to get it to where when people with player rights above 0 dont make the whole server dc

i think i saw in my client (the cmd prompt black box that opens with client) something like “error getpos npc” something like that with my username in there, i forgot exactly what the whole thing was, but it appeared right as everyone dced and i was too stupid to take screenie of it

Read full topic

item.title: Server crashing after 10 or 11 players
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Confusedcrap, post:11, topic:341787”]kk

btw i found out something just now

okay so… whenever i got on my acc (the owner acc) for about a minute with 14 ppl on, server dced everyone and me too

so i decided to play as an account with 0 rights, and the server was PERFECTLY NORMAL with 18 or so players online

Conclusion: Something is seriously jacked up when people with rights are online, because 18 people were on, no lag and no dc’s and there were no staff online. So, the only problem is going about fixing that, which i have no clue where to start doing. Help appreciated :)[/quote]try your playerRights are 4 or higher.

Read full topic

Conclusion: Something is seriously jacked up when people with rights are online, because 18 people were on, no lag and no dc’s and there were no staff online. So, the only problem is going about fixing that, which i have no clue where to start doing. Help appreciated
